translations: （马及有蹄动物的）后腿的上部；束帆带；束帆索

sentences.sentence: Eva Gaskin has been married for 17 years.
sentences.translation: 伊娃·加斯金和她的丈夫结婚17年了。

sentences.sentence: Gaskin: We have our own business and a good number of loyal customers.
sentences.translation: 盖世霆：我们有自己的固定客源和相当一批老客户。

sentences.sentence: Gaskin: the Olympics and Expo will undoubtedly bring a boom to the local hospitality industry.
sentences.translation: 盖世霆：奥运会和世博会将为当地酒店业带来繁荣，这点勿庸置疑。
